name: Windows Light
description: This is was my entry for my first game jam over at https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-168 with the theme of 'Pass the Torch'. My mate Nick (https://twitter.com/nicknition did the character design. I did all the programming for this. I chose to do simple procedural map generation so it is less work for me and more work working on other parts of the game. I hope I can update this game in the future and continue development. Have a good day everyone!
